name: MoMonster - House Escape
description:
MoMonster - House Escape — interesting scary horror in the first person.

You will come face to face with a serious danger in the form of a wandering monster monster, with a creepy and strange appearance.
You only have a flashlight... With it in hand you will need to escape and escape from this horrible house, while carrying out various tasks: search of the key and the fuse, find the repair kit, etc. But in the end to survive and escape.

You will experience a deep, dark atmosphere of horror and fear, with disturbing ambient music and threatening sounds.

Good luck!



Warning: the Game does not copy anyone's images and does not try to repeat them.
The game has advertising.
